extent: Iraq's hard-core defenders
Sentence: SOUTHERN IRAQ ( AP ) Edging closer to engagement with Iraq 's hard-core defenders , U.S. and British forces besieged the southern city of Basra on Saturday and pounded Baghdad with impunity in the first daylight air raids of the war .

extent: thousands in the regular Iraqi army

Sentence: Allies boasted `` the instruments of tyranny are collapsing , '' and so , from all appearances , was the will to fight among thousands in the regular Iraqi army .

extent: Iraqi territory
Sentence: Ground forces were halfway to Baghdad on Saturday , about 150 miles ( 240 kilometers ) into Iraqi territory .

extent: Near Basra, Cobra attack helicopters, attack jets, tanks and 155 mm howitzers fought ahead of the troops to clear Highway 80
Sentence: Near Basra , Cobra attack helicopters , attack jets , tanks and 155 mm howitzers fought ahead of the troops to clear Highway 80 .

extent: U.S. officials
Sentence: The road was nicknamed Highway of Death during the 1991 Gulf War because of an American air assault so devastating and graphic that it even gave U.S. officials pause .

extent: U.S. Brig. Gen
Sentence: `` The attack continues as we speak , and has already moved the distance of the longest maneuver in the 1991 Gulf War in a quarter of the time , '' U.S. Brig. Gen. Vince Brooks said .

extent: Iraqi President
Sentence: The fate of Iraqi President Saddam Hussein remained unknown to the U.S. and British officials trying to kill him .

extent: U.S. Gen
Sentence: `` Actually , I do n't know if he 's alive or not , '' U.S. Gen. Tommy Franks , the war commander , said Saturday .

extent: U.S. officials
Sentence: U.S. officials had no new , credible intelligence showing whether he had survived assaults on his compounds , or whether he might have been wounded , as has been speculated .

extent: his compounds
Sentence: U.S. officials had no new , credible intelligence showing whether he had survived assaults on his compounds , or whether he might have been wounded , as has been speculated .

extent: a U.S. official
Sentence: But a U.S. official , speaking on condition of anonymity , said another senior Iraqi leader was known to be alive and might be running some of Iraq 's defenses : Saddam 's cousin Ali Hassan al-Majid al-Tikriti .

extent: Saddam's cousin

extent: Turkish leaders
Sentence: After weeks of recalcitrance by Turkish leaders , U.S. military officials gave up on the idea of using Turkish bases to move heavy armored forces into northern Iraq , and redirected ships loaded with the weaponry to the Gulf .
